children.alt: Visual interpretation of the derivative - the derivative of a function f at a point x is equal to the slope of the tangent line to the graph of the function f at a point x.

children.value: Find the derivative of the function

children.html: f(x)=x3+x+125.f(x) = x^3+x+125.f(x)=x3+x+125.

children.value: Find the derivative of the function

children.html: f(x)=(x+1)⋅(3x2+2).f(x) = (x+1) \cdot (3x^2+2).f(x)=(x+1)⋅(3x2+2).

children.value: Find the derivative of the function

children.html: f(x)=x2x+1.\displaystyle f(x) = \frac{x^2}{x+1}.f(x)=x+1x2​.

children.value: Find the derivative of the function

children.html: f(x)=3x⋅3x.\displaystyle f(x) = 3x \cdot 3^x.f(x)=3x⋅3x.

children.value: Find the derivative of the function

children.html: f(x)=2x⋅(5x+7)x2+5⋅x.\displaystyle f(x) = \frac{2^x \cdot (5x+7)}{x^2+5} \cdot \sqrt{x}.f(x)=x2+52x⋅(5x+7)​⋅x​.

children.value: The following formula tells us how to find derivative of compositions:

children.html: f(g(x))′=f′(g(x))⋅g′(x).f(g(x))' = f'(g(x)) \cdot g'(x).f(g(x))′=f′(g(x))⋅g′(x).
